languages.text: "Кажется, Аребенниан имеет ввиду портал, сквозь который мы попадаем на арену. Он что-то планирует с ним сделать?"

traits.locale_text: "Кажется, Аребенниан имеет ввиду портал, сквозь который мы попадаем на арену. Он что-то планирует с ним сделать?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"
languages.original_text: "Кажется, Аребенниан имеет ввиду портал, сквозь который мы попадаем на арену. Он что-то планирует с ним сделать?"

traits.locale_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我觉得独角指的就是通往竞技场的传送门，他是打算对那扇传送门做些什么吗？”
languages.original_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"

traits.locale_text: “我觉得独角指的就是通往竞技场的传送门，他是打算对那扇传送门做些什么吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Creo que el Arebennian se refiere al portal que nos lleva al coliseo. ¿Está planeando usarlo para algo?».
languages.original_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"

traits.locale_text: «Creo que el Arebennian se refiere al portal que nos lleva al coliseo. ¿Está planeando usarlo para algo?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「アーベニアンは闘技場へのポータルのことを言っているのだと思う。何かするつもりなのか？」
languages.original_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"

traits.locale_text: 「アーベニアンは闘技場へのポータルのことを言っているのだと思う。何かするつもりなのか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich glaube, der Arebennian meint das Portal, das uns zur Arena bringt. Hat er damit etwas vor?"
languages.original_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, der Arebennian meint das Portal, das uns zur Arena bringt. Hat er damit etwas vor?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je crois que l'Arebennian parle du portail qui nous permet d'accéder à l'arène. A-t-il l'intention de lui faire quelque chose ? »
languages.original_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"

traits.locale_text: « Je crois que l'arebennian parle du portail qui nous permet d'accéder à l'arène. A-t-il l'intention de lui faire quelque chose ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Arebennian, sanırım bizi arenaya götüren portalı ima ediyor. Portalla ilgili bir şey mi planlıyor?"
languages.original_text: "I think the Arebennian is referring to the portal that takes us to the arena. Is he planning to do something to it?"

traits.locale_text: "Arebennian, sanırım bizi arenaya götüren portalı ima ediyor. Portalla ilgili bir şey mi planlıyor?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
